sections.content: Test your understanding of Zoho Desk concepts covered in this training program.

questions.question: Which Work Mode is most useful for ensuring SLA compliance by showing tickets based on time remaining?
questions.explanation: Countdown Mode sorts tickets by time remaining until SLA breach, making it the best choice for ensuring SLA compliance by highlighting tickets that need immediate attention.

questions.question: What is the key difference between Conversations and Comments in a ticket?
options: Conversations are for emails only, Comments are for chat
Conversations are customer-facing, Comments are internal and not visible to customers
Conversations are permanent, Comments can be deleted
There is no difference - they are the same feature
questions.explanation: Conversations display all customer-facing communications (emails, chat, social), while Comments are internal notes that allow agents to collaborate without the customer seeing the discussion.

questions.question: When should you use Parent-Child ticketing?
options: When a ticket needs to be escalated to a manager
When a customer reports multiple issues that need to be tracked separately
When you want to archive old tickets
questions.explanation: Parent-Child ticketing is used when a customer reports multiple issues in one request. You create child tickets for each specific issue while maintaining a parent ticket to track overall resolution.

questions.question: What are Snippets used for in Zoho Desk?
options: Automatically categorizing tickets based on keywords
Reusable text shortcuts that expand into common responses
questions.explanation: Snippets are reusable text shortcuts that help agents quickly insert common responses and information. Type a snippet shortcode to expand it into full text, significantly speeding up response times.

questions.question: Which list view displays tickets in a spreadsheet-style format with customizable columns?
questions.explanation: Table View provides a spreadsheet-style display with customizable columns, ideal for data-focused work. Classic View shows traditional rows, and Compact View is a condensed version showing more tickets on screen.
